sections.title:
We are
Poppy Time
sections.p1: On this website, you will find everything you need to know about our group, Poppy Time.
sections.p2: We met in high school in Quimper. We play Funk, Electronic, Rock, and love mixing rhythms and genres to produce catchy and interesting music.
sections.p3: We are looking for concert dates for next summer. We can perform for 1 hour, exclusively with original compositions. You can listen to and watch some of our compositions in the section
sections.p4: We have already had the opportunity to perform for many concerts, including the Brest Music Festival and the Cornouaille Festival in Quimper. You can see excerpts from our concerts in the section
sections.p5: Our group consists of five members: a guitarist, a bassist/singer, a pianist, a drummer, and a saxophonist. Each brings their own personal touch to our music. You can watch a short video for each member of the group in the section
sections.p6: During our concerts, we received many positive feedbacks. We have also been featured in press articles and even had the honor of being featured on France Inter. You can see these articles in the section
sections.p7: If you want to see our current and future projects, visit the section
sections.p8: We would be delighted to participate in your event. You can be sure that if you book Poppy Time, everyone will be able to dance and groove.
sections.p9: You can follow us on social media: Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, YouTube, and contact us via email at poppy.timme@gmail.com

studio-1.title: Novomax
studio-1.description: During August 2023, we focused on recording and filming a part of our set at Novomax in Quimper, in order to broadcast them and find new concert dates.

videos-1.description: Inspired by 1970s progressive rock. Parisian sunset, life on the streets, addiction of all kinds, a woman searches for her kidnapped son in vain...

videos-2.description: Music focused on a sense of nostalgia, telling the story of people struggling to let go of past happiness and move towards something new.

videos-3.description: Music in 2 parts that starts very funky and then mixes it with a techno-inspired bass play and wild saxophone flights.

videos-4.description: Take off means taking off, and this music gradually builds up to finally take off in an somewhat epic manner.

videos-5.description: A very funky groove, the funkyman doesn't hesitate to calm down the game to make room for his frenzied piano solo.

videos-6.description: Combining jungle techno with jersey drill, with a touch of Cory Wong and Mononeon, all of which means an adrenaline rush no matter the source.

concert-1.title: Music Festival
concert-1.description: Last summer, we were selected by the Brest city council, supervised by Margoulin Production. We had the opportunity to close the Étienne Dolet street stage during the music festival.

concert-2.title: Private Concert
concert-2.description: We played at a private party with 150 people.

project.name: Project
project.title: Project
project.p1: Last March, we released a 2-track EP available on all streaming platforms.
project.p2: We have the ambition to professionalize our group.
project.p3: We already have a date for November 25th at Run Ar Puns.
project.p4: We are currently working on a new album that will be released in 2024.
